assessment.title: Wordsearch
assessment.helpTextMainMenuScreen:
The aim of the game is to find all of the hidden words.

Click on 'Open a wordsearch' to select an existing wordsearch.
Click on 'Create a wordsearch' to create a new one (for this session).

To select a wordsearch, click on 'Open a wordsearch' in the Main menu screen, and then click on the title of a wordsearch. The number in the title tells you how many words you'll need to find.

In the Main game screen, click on the first letter of a word, drag the selection and release it on the last letter. The words will be displayed vertically or horizontally.

If you click on 'Show word list' you lose ten seconds.

You can increase or decrease the play time, but only at the beginning of a game.

To select a different wordsearch click on 'Main menu'. To play again click on 'New game'.
assessment.helpTextCreateWordSearchScreen:
To create a wordsearch, enter a title, select the size of the wordsearch, fill in all the boxes and click on 'Save'.
Words must be at least 2 characters long, and no longer than 8 (for an 8x8 game) or 12 (for a 12x12 game). To include accented letters in any of the words, hold down the Alt key and type the numerical code for the accented letter using your number keypad.

Click on 'Clear' to create a new wordsearch.
Click on 'Main menu' to select a game.

Any new wordsearches will appear in the list of existing wordsearches, but will not be saved after you close the program.
